Description: Rim sherd of Chian Wild Goat Style pottery chalice; white slip; interior: reserved band at rim, glazed streaky black below; traces of two faded added white bands near bottom of sherd; top of rim glazed; exterior: broken maeander frieze at rim, above dot and billet band; reserved below; inscription on exterior.
Curator's comments: The number 41 is written in pencil on the interior surface.
Bibliographic references: Lemos 1991 / Archaic Pottery of Chios. The Decorated Styles (p. 239, no. 191)
Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (GD.0199) (phase 2)
